column4: One more question:  I was not asked for the root password upon setup, how do I create the root user with the password that I want?
hmm, no root user.  that is strange
I have downloaded libdvdcss2 and w32codecs, yet totem still does not want to play DVDs?  Any suggestions.
totem with gstreamer is a pile of garbage.. use mplayer or xine
